Recursion
=============

## Sum
```{r}
nSeq <- function(v){
  if(length(v)==0)
    return(0)
    return(rev(v[1])+nSeq(rev(v[-1])))
} 
nSeq(1:10)
```

```{r}
newaddEm <- function(v){
   if(length(v)==0)
     return(0)
     return(v[1]+newaddEm(v[-1]))
 }
```
Test Solutions
```{r}
newaddEm(1:10)
newaddEm(1:100)
```
